Key Match Events: Juan Soto hit a walk-off home run in the 11th inning to give the Yankees a 4-3 victory over the Royals
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees had struggled against left-handed pitchers and Aaron Judge and Juan Soto were in slumps
Post-Match Reflections: Jazz Chisholm Jr. commented on the team's resilience and their ability to grind out wins
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game went into extras and the Yankees won 4-3 on an infield single by Chisholm
Others: The win extended the Yankees' lead in the American League East to 1 1/2 games
